channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title:
"菲利普-福克斯（Philip Fox）写道："人工智能发展得太快了，我们不能采取'观望'的态度。政治家们 "现在必须决定他们愿意接受多大的公共话语风险"。
图片丹-威廉姆斯
item.description:
“AI is moving too fast for a ‘wait and see’ approach,” writes Philip Fox. Politicians “must decide now how much risk to public discourse they are willing to accept” econ.st/3SBZoBc

Image: Dan Williams

item.title:
几乎所有地方的女性在为人父母后，其职业生涯都会受到影响，而且影响比男性更大。
我们探讨了爱与劳动对母亲就业的成本👇。
item.description:
Almost everywhere women’s careers suffer—more than men’s—after they become parents.

We explore the cost of love and labour on mothers’ employment econ.st/48ZkzUH 👇

item.title: 印度腐败警察的目标是纳伦德拉-莫迪的批评者吗？过去十年中，洗钱突袭增加了 27 倍，其中许多是针对反对派的 👇
item.description: Are India’s corruption police targeting Narendra Modi’s critics? Money-laundering raids, many on the opposition, have increased 27-fold in the last decade econ.st/3UseH1B 👇

item.title: 非洲最便宜的新建房屋一般也要 2 万至 4 万美元。而人均收入仅为 1700 美元左右。在贷款难的非洲大陆，住房短缺正促使人们进行彻底的反思 👇
item.description: The cheapest newly built house in Africa generally costs the equivalent of $20,000-40,000. Yet income per person is only about $1,700. In a continent where loans are hard to come by, the housing shortage is prompting a radical rethink econ.st/499npXk 👇

item.title: 成绩好的人在太阳升起之前就已经做了充分的锻炼。他们不会因为觉得有点累而取消早餐，当然他们也不会承认这样做。我们解释了为什么精力似乎在成功中扮演着重要角色👇。
item.description: High-achievers have done a full workout before the sun rises. They don’t cancel breakfasts because they are feeling a bit tired; they certainly don’t admit to doing so. We explain why energy seems to play an outsize role in success econ.st/3w5AnGO 👇

item.title: 世界上最可爱的语言是什么？我们回顾语言的魅力 👇
item.description: What is the world’s loveliest language? We review the attractiveness of speech econ.st/3umtT5X 👇

item.title:
自 2012 年以来，英格兰和威尔士的毒品致死率逐年上升。20 世纪 70 年代出生的人最有可能死亡。
最令人担忧的是合成阿片类药物的消费👇。
item.description:
Drug fatalities in England and Wales have risen every year since 2012. People born in the 1970s are the likeliest to die.

The most worrying part of the picture involves the consumption of synthetic opioids econ.st/3UD2E1P 👇

item.title: 考虑到其糟糕的经济管理，埃及无能的政权不应该得到救助。但它还是应该得到救助。中东地区已经火烧眉毛，经不起人口最多国家的崩溃👇。
item.description: Egypt’s feckless regime does not deserve a bailout, considering its atrocious economic management. But it should get one nonetheless. The wider Middle East, already burning, cannot afford the collapse of its most populous country econ.st/3wfv4EB 👇

item.title: 在经历了数周的股市动荡之后，中国证券监督管理委员会主任突然被解职撤换。他不是第一个在股价暴跌后落马的官员，但这次感觉不同👇。
item.description: After weeks of stockmarket instability the head of the China Securities Regulatory Commission was suddenly fired and replaced. He is not the first official to fall after a period of plummeting stock prices, but this time feels different econ.st/3HRg9Dj 👇

item.title:
与许多民粹主义政党一样，波兰的法律与公正党在其执政的八年中，攫取了对独立国家机构的控制权，并在这些机构中充斥着忠实拥护者。
现在，唐纳德-图斯克正努力消除强硬右翼对国家的控制👇。
item.description:
Like many populist parties, Poland’s Law and Justice party grabbed control of independent state institutions and packed them with loyalists during its eight years in power.

Now Donald Tusk is trying to undo the hard-right’s capture of the state econ.st/49rThpO 👇

item.title: 在巴基斯坦即将举行议会选举之际，这个国家很少出现如此混乱的局面。它是如何走到这一步的？以下六本书可以帮你一探究竟： 📚
item.description: As Pakistan heads for a parliamentary election, the country has rarely been in such a mess. How did it get there? Here are six books to help you find out: econ.st/3HLxv4B 📚

item.title: 大学未能促进经济增长。一篇新论文指出，大学的迅猛发展与富裕国家停滞不前的生产力可能是一枚硬币的两面 👇。
item.description: Universities are failing to boost economic growth. A new paper suggests that institutions’ blistering growth and the rich world’s stagnant productivity could be two sides of the same coin econ.st/4854Thh 👇

item.title: 您早上的咖啡有危险 👇
item.description: Your morning cup of coffee is in danger econ.st/3w7Ns2p 👇

item.title: 经过数周的政治喧嚣和国民议会的争吵，塞内加尔总统取消了选举。麦基-萨勒到底想干什么？他声称要捍卫民主，但许多塞内加尔人担心他不怀好意👇。
item.description: After weeks of political rumbling—and a brawl in the National Assembly—Senegal’s president has called off its election. What is Macky Sall up to? He claims to be defending democracy, yet many Senegalese fear he is up to no good econ.st/3w3LwrB 👇

item.title: 欧洲最昂贵的城市也是世界上最昂贵的城市，与新加坡并列 👇
item.description: The most expensive city in Europe is also the most expensive in the world—tied with Singapore econ.st/3SPVF4g 👇

item.title: 美国简讯是我们最新的订阅通讯，它提供了重要的政治新闻，让您了解影响选举事务的事件和人物。注册后，您每天都能在收件箱中收到 ⬇️
item.description: The US in brief, our latest subscriber newsletter, provides a run-down of the political news that matters, keeping you informed about the events and people shaping electoral affairs. Sign up to get it in your inbox daily econ.st/3UzBF74 ⬇️

item.title: 公元 79 年维苏威火山爆发后，数以百计的罗马卷轴被碳化，无法阅读。试图用物理方法展开卷轴会导致卷轴解体。但是，多亏了人工智能，研究人员成功地揭开了它们的秘密： 📜📜。
item.description: Hundreds of Roman scrolls left carbonised by the eruption of Mount Vesuvius in 79AD have been impossible to read. Efforts to unroll them physically caused them to disintegrate. But thanks to AI researchers are successfully uncovering their secrets: econ.st/481zSe8 📜

item.title: 美国曾是经合组织（OECD）中少女怀孕率最高的国家。到2012年，美国的少女怀孕率已低于经合组织的平均水平。下降的原因是什么？ 👇
item.description: America used to have the highest teenage-pregnancy rate in the OECD, a club of mostly rich countries. By 2012 it had fallen below the OECD’s average. What might be behind this decline? econ.st/3OwrUmm 👇

item.title: 数百万中国人将毕生积蓄投入到可能永远无法建成的房产中。1843 》杂志采访了心怀不满的准居民 👇 。
item.description: Millions of Chinese people have ploughed their life savings into properties that may never get built. 1843 magazine talks to disgruntled would-be residents econ.st/3HQXZkZ 👇

item.title: 中国的沙滩文化是社会的缩影 👇
item.description: China’s beach culture is a microcosm of society econ.st/3SQjZBV 👇

item.title: 漫威的衰落令人惊讶：长期以来，这个品牌似乎所向披靡。迪斯尼内部人士认为，漫威的衰落有几个原因 👇
item.description: The decline of Marvel is surprising: for a long time, the brand seemed invincible. Disney insiders suggest several causes for the slump econ.st/3SRLKv3 👇

item.title: 以色列蔑视美国史无前例的和平计划。该地区战火纷飞，比比-内塔尼亚胡却不屈不挠👇。
item.description: Israel has scorned America’s unprecedented peace plan. As the region burns, Bibi Netanyahu is defiant econ.st/3SuEGmz 👇

item.title: 一种 "涡轮增压超级猪 "正在加拿大大草原上肆虐。当它们南迁时会发生什么？ 👇
item.description: A breed of “turbocharged superpigs” is raising hell on the Canadian prairies. What could happen when they move south? econ.st/3uoZpQG 👇

item.title:
在巴基斯坦即将举行议会选举之际，这个国家很少出现如此混乱的局面。它是如何走到这一步的？以下六本书可以帮你找到答案：
图片：Rex ShutterstockRex Shutterstock
item.description:
As Pakistan heads for a parliamentary election, the country has rarely been in such a mess. How did it get there? Here are six books to help you find out: econ.st/3uztwox

Image: Rex Shutterstock

item.title: 在撒哈拉以南非洲地区，融资和建房方面的困难导致了严重的住房危机。然而，非洲大陆对住房的需求也是一个巨大的机遇👇。
item.description: The struggle to finance and build homes is contributing to a profound housing crisis in sub-Saharan Africa. Yet the continent’s need for housing is also a tremendous opportunity econ.st/4bmiAv4 👇

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人正在帮助弗拉基米尔-普京。他们在乌克兰问题上的玩世不恭削弱了美国，使世界变得不那么安全👇。
item.description: House Republicans in America are helping Vladimir Putin. Their cynicism over Ukraine weakens America and makes the world less safe econ.st/3OzBCo2 👇

item.title: 中国的经济前景比近代历史上任何时期都要黯淡。房地产市场的严峻形势是主要原因👇。
item.description: China’s economic prospects are gloomier than at any point in recent history. The dire state of the property market is the chief cause econ.st/3w6GWc5 👇

item.title: 社交媒体正在经历一场深刻却鲜为人知的变革。令人震惊的是，社交媒体不再具有社交属性。潮流正在转向 👇
item.description: Social media are undergoing a profound but little-noticed transformation. Strikingly, they are no longer very social. The tide is turning econ.st/483LrBr 👇

item.title: 韩国的编剧和导演在玩 "乌贼游戏"。韩国影视业蓬勃发展的幕后推手并未从中获利👇。
item.description: South Korea’s writers and directors play Squid Game. The people behind the country’s TV and film boom are not profiting from it econ.st/3UwSqzG 👇

item.title:
泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）出现在阴谋论者的咆哮声中，成为他们噩梦中的女主角，这似乎有些奇怪。
但在极端两极化的美国，政治纷争会蔓延到不可能的地方👇。
item.description:
It may seem odd for Taylor Swift to feature in the rants of conspiracists—to be the actress starring in their bad dreams, as she might put it.

But in an ultra-polarised America, political strife spreads into unlikely places econ.st/3ueSJVr 👇
